settings.title: GET ON THE LIST
settings.description:
Join our mailing list and be the first to hear about new
arrivals, store events, complimentary offers and more. 歡迎訂閱我們的宣傳電郵
率先了解最新產品、商店活動及免費優惠等體驗。
settings.note:
We use email and targeted online advertising to send you product and services updates, promotional offers and other marketing communications
based on the information we collect about you, such as your email address, general location, and purchase and website browsing history. We process your personal data as stated in our Privacy Policy. You may withdraw your consent or manage your preferences at any time by clicking
the unsubscribe link at the bottom of any of our marketing emails, or by emailing us at cs@hourglasscosmetics.com. 我們會根據所收集到有關於您的資料，包括電郵地址、位置、購物記錄及網站瀏覽記錄，透過電郵和網上定位廣告向您提供產品資料、相關服務、折扣優惠及宣傳資訊。

我們會按照既有的隱私政策 Privacy Policy 中所述處理您的個人資料。 您可以隨時於我們所有宣傳電郵底部點按取消訂閱鏈接，或發送電郵至
cs@hourglasscosmetics.com 撤回同意或管理訂閱選項。

settings.title:
EQUILIBRIUM
REBALANCING CREAM CLEANSER
settings.top_desc:
Removes 98%+ of pollutants
Delivers intense hydration
Restores radiance
HOW TO USE:
Use morning and evening to
help protect skin’s moisture barrier.
settings.bottom_desc:
KEY INGREDIENTS:
  • Cell Balancing Complex™
    A powerful combination of youth lipids
    (phospholipids and prolipids) that rebalances,
    restores and renews the skin barrier
  • Agastache Mexicana Flower Extract
    Preserves moisture and reduces skin
    inflammation for youthful radiance

settings.title:
EQUILIBRIUM
RESTORING ESSENCE
settings.top_desc:
93% said their skin looks healthier
100% said their skin feels hydrated
90% said their pores look more refined
96% said their skin feels calmed
93% said products applied afterwards are easily absorbed
HOW TO USE:
Use before makeup to condition,
hydrate and prime skin​.
settings.bottom_desc:
KEY INGREDIENTS:
  • Cell Balancing Complex™
    A powerful combination of youth lipids
    (phospholipids and prolipids) that rebalances,
    restores and renews the skin barrier
  • Pollution Shield Complex
    A trifecta of protective ingredients
    that shield the skin from environmental
    pollutants, like blue light, smoke and smog

settings.title:
EQUILIBRIUM
INTENSIVE HYDRATING EYE BALM
settings.top_desc:
90% said skin is instantly hydrated
Reduces dark circles after 3 days of use
80% said fine lines faded after 7 days of use
95% said they look more awake
HOW TO USE:
Apply once each evening to the undereye and outer
contours of the eyes to hydrate and smooth the eye area.
settings.bottom_desc:
KEY INGREDIENTS:
  • Cell Balancing Complex™
    A powerful combination of youth lipids (phospholipids and prolipids) that rebalances, restores and renews the skin barrier
  • Hydration Barrier Complex
    A shield of potent ingredients that improves skin’s moisture content to strengthen the skin barrier and smooth texture
  • Cocoa Seed Extract
    Visibly smooths the skin’s surface, and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

settings.title:
EQUILIBRIUM
DAY FLUID SUNSCREEN
BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 30
settings.top_desc:
Hydrates and protects the skin from the elements
Rebalances skin by promoting natural cell turnover
throughout the day
Broad Spectrum SPF 30 formula features a blend of
four organic chemical compounds to shield the skin
from the effects of daytime sun
HOW TO USE:
Apply liberally onto face and neck to shield
the skin from the effects of the daytime sun.
settings.bottom_desc:
KEY INGREDIENTS:
  • Cell Balancing Complex™
    A powerful combination of youth lipids
    (phospholipids and prolipids) that rebalances,
    restores and renews the skin barrier
  • Broad Spectrum SPF 30
    A blend of four organic compounds
    to shield the skin from the sun
  • Vitamin E
    Antioxidant that helps keep
    skin barrier moisturized and protected
    from free radical damage

settings.title:
EQUILIBRIUM
BIOMIMETIC SKIN ACTIVE SERUM
settings.top_desc:
Contains highly active molecules that promote
natural cell regeneration
Hydrating formula powered by an advanced delivery
system that releases ingredients at the most optimal
levels that defend against visible signs of aging
HOW TO USE:
Apply liberally onto face and massage or press
into the skin until the product is fully absorbed.
Designed as a nighttime rebalancing product.
settings.bottom_desc:
KEY INGREDIENTS:
  • Cell Balancing Complex™
    A powerful combination of youth lipids
    (phospholipids and prolipids) that rebalances,
    restores and renews the skin barrier
  • Squalane
    A powerful, hydrating antioxidant that
    absorbs quickly and deeply into skin
  • Dunaliella Salina Extract
    A unique algae containing rich concentrations
    of carotenoids, antioxidants and essential vitamins
    that helps even skin tone, brighten the complexion
    and act as a free radical protector

settings.title:
EQUILIBRIUM
RESTORATIVE HYDRATING CREAM
WITH NIACINAMIDE
settings.top_desc:
PROVEN RESULTS:
  • 97% said skin felt smoother
    93% said skin felt more hydrate and nourised
    90% said skin looked healthier
settings.bottom_desc:
KEY INGREDIENTS:
  • Cell Balancing Complex™
    A powerful combination of youth lipids
    (phospholipids and prolipids) that rebalances,
    restores and renews the skin barrier
  • Niacinamide
    Visibly evens skin tone, helps reduce
    the look of fine lines and wrinkles,
    and protects against pollution,
    environmental, and blue light stressors.
  • Squalane
    A powerful, hydrating antioxidant that
    absorbs quickly and deeply into skin

settings.desc: "Makeup has always held a sort of magical power in my mind. When I was a teenager, my mom took me for my first makeup application, and it's an experience I'll never forget."

settings.recognizesDesc: Hourglass recognizes the importance of makeup artists and celebrates their creative expression and talent, from seasoned industry pros to students who are just getting started.

settings.title: HOURGLASS PRO MEMBERS ENJOY MANY BENEFITS, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:
settings.description: • 30% discount for orders on hourglasscosmetics.com and hourglasscosmetics.co.uk • Early access to new product launches • Private events

settings.title: 30% OFF
settings.desc: Industry Professionals, Bridal/Special Events, Celebrity, Editorial, Film, and Television Makeup Artists. Must provide valid ID and credentials.
settings.desc1: Only students enrolled in schools of Makeup Artistry, Aesthetics, Cosmetology, and the Performing Arts will be eligible. Must provide valid ID and proof of enrollment.

settings.question: WHAT IS HOURGLASS PRO?
settings.answer: Hourglass PRO is a members-only program designed to support the professional makeup artist community. With benefits including a membership discount, exclusive content, and private events, Hourglass PRO aims to amplify and connect makeup artists across the world.

settings.question: HOW DO I BECOME AN HOURGLASS PRO MEMBER?
settings.answer:
• Step 1: Create an account
  • Step 2: Fill out an application
  • Step 3: Include required documentation in application

settings.question: IS THE MEMBERSHIP FREE?
settings.answer: Yes, the Hourglass PRO membership is free.

settings.question: WHAT ARE THE BENEFITS OF BECOMING AN HOURGLASS PRO MEMBER?
settings.answer:
• Product discounts
  • Exclusive content
  • Private events
  • Masterclasses
  • Early access to new launches
Note: Benefits are subject to change.

settings.question: HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE TO BE APPROVED AS A MEMBER?
settings.answer: Please allow 3-4 weeks after your application has been submitted. Once your application is approved, we'll email you a unique Hourglass PRO code.

settings.question: HOW LONG IS MY MEMBERSHIP VALID FOR?
settings.answer: Your unique code is valid for two years and is non-transferrable.

settings.question: HOW DO I RENEW MY MEMBERSHIP?
settings.answer: You will receive an email one month before your code expires, with a link to renew. You can also renew your member on our site here.

settings.question: WHERE CAN I USE MY DISCOUNT?
settings.answer: Your discount code is valid on our hourglasscosmetics.com website.

settings.question: CAN I SHARE MY HOURGLASS PRO DISCOUNT?
settings.answer: No, the code is non-transferrable. If there are any indications of your code being shared, transferred or abused, your discount will immediately be revoked and any future applications will be rejected.

settings.question: CAN I STILL APPLY TO BE A MEMBER OF HOURGLASS PRO IF I DO NOT LIVE IN THE CONTINENTAL U.S.?
settings.answer: Yes, our PRO program is open to applicants internationally - anywhere Hourglass offers international shipping. Please review the list of countries we ship to here.

settings.question: IF I’M ALREADY AN HOURGLASS PRO MEMBER, DO I NEED TO REAPPLY TO THE UPDATED PROGRAM?
settings.answer: No, your membership status will automatically carry over. For additional questions, please contact us.
